trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles post-cache substitution.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理后缓存替换的方法。

trans-unit.source: The HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback delegate, in combination with the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A> method, is used for rendering post-cache content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> controls.
trans-unit.target: HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback 委托，结合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A>方法，用于呈现后缓存内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A> property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control executes.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控制，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A>属性来指定要时调用的回调方法的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控件执行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>

trans-unit.source: The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or on the user control that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的回调方法必须在页上或包含用户控件上的静态方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>

trans-unit.source: The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback delegate that takes an <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> parameter and returns a string.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法的签名必须与的签名匹配的一个 HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback 委托，它采用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>参数并返回一个字符串。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control, rendering is independent of the page caching unless an event handler is provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控件，呈现都独立于页面缓存，除非事件处理程序提供有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event handler is present, post-cache substitution is used to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> content.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>事件处理程序存在，则缓存后替换用于呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>
